## Model
```{r}
irfa<-read.csv("../data/Indian rail traffic net revenues.csv")
fit1<-lm(income~psgr_trains+goods_trains,data=irfa)
summary(fit1)
par(mfrow=c(2,2))
plot(fit1)
```
